com.tchristofferson.stocks.api.core

Interface IStock

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable

    public interface IStock
extends java.lang.Cloneable

    • Method Summary

      Get how much the player has paid to buy all shares of the stock

    • Method Detail

      • getSymbol

        java.lang.String getSymbol()
        Get the stock symbol
        Returns:
        The symbol for this stock

      • getOwner

        java.util.UUID getOwner()
        Get the UUID of the player that owns the stock
        Returns:
        The UUID of the player this stock belongs to

      • getShares

        int getShares()
        Get the number of shares the player owns of this stock
        Returns:
        How many shares of this stock the owning player owns

      • getInvested

        double getInvested()
        Get how much the player has paid to buy all shares of the stock
        Returns:
        How much has been invested in this stock

      • setShares

        void setShares(int shares)
        Set how many shares the owning player owns
        Parameters:
        shares - The new amount of shares

      • setInvested

        void setInvested(double invested)
        Set how much the owning player has invested into this stock
        Parameters:
        invested - The new invested amount

      • setCooldown

        void setCooldown(long wait)
        Set a cooldown for the stock. Set wait to 0 to remove a cooldown
        Parameters:
        wait - How long the cooldown should last in milliseconds

      • getCooldown

        long getCooldown()
        Get the time when player can sell shares
        Returns:
        The time the player can sell shares in millis

      • hasCooldown

        default boolean hasCooldown()
        Get if the player has a cooldown for the specified stock
        Returns:
        true if they have a cooldown, false otherwise
